ai-iti14:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti14:2.1_0: “Mendicants, I do not see a single hindrance, hindered by which people wander and transmigrate for a long time like the hindrance of ignorance.
ai-iti14:2.2_0: Because for a long time ignorance, they wander and transmigrate for a long time.”
ai-iti14:2.3_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti14:3.2_0: those who caught up in conceit,
ai-iti14:4.1_0: Those who have given up delusion,
ai-iti14:4.2_0: they shattered the mass of darkness.
ai-iti14:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
